text: Zisas mba buni mbe nzua vov khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde mbararagi, mbe fhum khaŋ suaŋgi, ‘Nde guigira won kɨvntogi vuzvugɨp, nde won pana gumgi ga suaŋv ndav shiri.’ 5.43 Ndavar harigi gumgir nɨɨŋga kameŋ ne Wok Pris 19.18 ki. Mba panan nza kegi gumgi ndavi mbe suaŋv mbarɨgɨrga kameŋ, ne mba kega zɨgi. Kha gavi ganɨri. Lo 7.2, 20.16, Sng 139.21, 22.
